ModMetaData.description: This mod changes the basic Room Stats Color into rainbow :D The room stats aro no more dull and plain. Currently doesn't work with different language than ENG. I tried Czech, but I don't know how to do it properly. In this mod have also implemented a tweak which changes the Room Size mechanics.
